import React,{useState} from 'react'; import Modal from "react-modal"; import { useForm } from "react-hook-form"; import { BsX } from "react-icons/bs"; function UpdatePurchases({ toUpdatPurchases }) { const [modalIsOpen, setModalIsOpen] = useState(false); const { register, handleSubmit, formState: { errors } } = useForm(); return ( <>
setModalIsOpen(modalIsOpen)} className="mb-3 text-2xl cursor-pointer font-bold ml-auto" />
{/* buttons */}
setModalIsOpen(false)} className="appearance-none block w-full bg-red-500 text-white font-bold rounded-md pr-3 py-3 mb-3 leading-tight focus:outline-none " id="grid-first-name" type="button" value="Close" />
) } export default UpdatePurchases
